Articles.Content: I just updated KSP to 1.2.1 from the official website, and after opening it, the loading bar says "unpacking assets", so I have left it running overnight, hoping this will fix it, however, I do not know if it will work. If you have encountered this, I would be very grateful for helpful feedback on how to fix it. P.S. this is the Mac version.

Is it Mac Sierra? Just finished posting in that other thread.

so there is an known issues with Sierra and a number of threads with how to deal with it.

here is one such thread

It's either Sierra or El Capitan, I'm not sure (The computer belongs to my father, but he lets me play KSP on it)

I'll ask him tomorrow, It's late

Mac user as well. 

Have you tried searching the problem? There is a well known and documented issue with Macs (particularly with Sierra)

A google or forum search should render a solution.
Yes! I searched the forum, and yes, it is a problem with mac sierra, and I found a post that said how to fix it!
